caption:
"A glossy wooden conference table with a rich brown color and elongated rectangular shape. Features sturdy metal legs and a smooth surface. Designed for meetings and collaborative work. Positioned in the center of a well-lit room surrounded by office chairs and near windows with blinds."

"A possibly plastic trash can-type object, translucent blue with a cylindrical shape. Has a flexible bag liner and an open top. Likely used for waste disposal. Located near the wall in a meeting room setting with other furniture around."
